admin.create_course_prompt:
Please send the new course details in the following format:

Kurs nomi uz: <course name in Uzbek>
Kurs nomi ru: <course name in Russian>
Kurs nomi en: <course name in English>
Ta’rif uz: <course description in Uzbek>
Ta’rif ru: <course description in Russian>
Ta’rif en: <course description in English>
Narx: <course price in UZS; if free, enter 0>

Example:
Kurs nomi uz: Matematika asoslari
Kurs nomi ru: Основы математики
Kurs nomi en: Basics of Mathematics
Ta’rif uz: Bu kurs maktab matematika asoslarini o‘rgatadi.
Ta’rif ru: Этот курс обучает основам школьной математики.
Ta’rif en: This course teaches the basics of school-level math.
Narx: 50000
admin.create_lesson_prompt:
Please send the new lesson details in the following format:

Lesson title uz: <title in Uzbek>
Lesson title ru: <title in Russian>
Lesson title en: <title in English>
Content type: <video/text/audio>
Content link: <link>
Order: <number>

Example:
Lesson title uz: Kirish darsi
Lesson title ru: Вводный урок
Lesson title en: Introduction Lesson
Content type: video
Content link: https://example.com/video
Order: 1
admin.create_quiz_prompt:
Please send the new quiz details in the following format:

Question uz: <question in Uzbek>
Question ru: <question in Russian>
Question en: <question in English>
Options uz: <option1, option2, option3, option4>
Options ru: <option1, option2, option3, option4>
Options en: <option1, option2, option3, option4>
Correct answer: <number 0-3>

Example:
Question uz: 2+2 nechchi?
Question ru: Сколько будет 2+2?
Question en: What is 2+2?
Options uz: 2, 3, 4, 5
Options ru: 2, 3, 4, 5
Options en: 2, 3, 4, 5
Correct answer: 2
